title: Ulcer at work
creator_credit: University of Oklahoma and Ned Hockman
brief_description: Looks at the way in which emotional problems can cause ulcers, and illustrates the prescribed mental attitudes and dietary procedures necessary for curing a peptic ulcer in its preliminary stage.
description: Looks at the way in which emotional problems can cause ulcers, and illustrates the prescribed mental attitudes and dietary procedures necessary for curing a peptic ulcer in its preliminary stage.
